body:
Im leaving because god the server isnt as good as it used to be. People are so frustrating to talk to. Server lag is unreal. The fricking DOWNLOADING TERRAIN crap is still there. Last year a tourney was pretty much promised, never came. and the server lag. GOD don't even get me started on that.
Well peace

title: My leave till update
